results.definition: extraordinarily large in size or extent or amount or power or degree; that a whole civilization should be dependent on technology"- Walter Lippman
examples: a tremendous fact in human experience
a plane took off with a tremendous noise

results.definition: extraordinarily good or great; used especially as intensifiers
examples: a fantastic trip to the Orient
a marvelous collection of rare books
had a rattling conversation about politics

results.definition: extreme in degree or extent or amount or impact
examples: spent a frightful amount of money
